languages.text: "Твою, Махарий, прямоту, легко читать. Когда я сказал о помощи Гапракам, ты и понятия не имел, о чем речь. Зато твоя супруга — о, как забегали ее глаза. Регина Зауэрбэк, вы единолично предали Вольного Торговца, поставив под угрозу благополучие торговой династии фон Валанциус. И сами же выдали себя".

traits.locale_text: "Вы стояли за всем этим, не так ли, госпожа Зауэрбек? Вы предали Вольного Торговца, вы поставили под угрозу благополучие торговой династии фон Воланциус. Вы сами выдали себя".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."
languages.original_text: "Твою, Махарий, прямоту, легко читать. Когда я сказал о помощи Гапракам, ты и понятия не имел, о чем речь. Зато твоя супруга — о, как забегали ее глаза. Регина Зауэрбэк, вы единолично предали Вольного Торговца, поставив под угрозу благополучие торговой династии фон Валанциус. И сами же выдали себя".

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, your bluntness is easy to read. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you didn't have a clue about it. Your wife, on the other hand — oh, how her eyes started shifting. Regina Sauerback, you solely betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the well-being of the von Valancius trading dynasty. And you also betrayed yourself, too."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, your bluntness is easy to read. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you didn't have a clue about it. Your wife, on the other hand — oh, how her eyes started shifting. Regina Sauerback, you solely betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the well-being of the von Valancius trading dynasty. And you also betrayed yourself, too."

Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「マハリウス、あなたの率直さがすべて教えてくれたのです。私がギャプラック家への援助について話しても、あなたはそんなそぶりを見せませんでした。一方で、信じられないと言わんばかりに彼女の目は移ろぎだしました。レジーナ・ザウアーバック、あなたは単身、自由開拓者を裏切り、フォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝の反映を危うくしました。自分の正体が暴かれてしまったのは、あなただけの責任なのです」
languages.original_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: 「マハリウス、あなたの率直さがすべて教えてくれたのです。私がギャプラック家への援助について話しても、あなたはそんなそぶりを見せませんでした。一方で、信じられないと言わんばかりに彼女の目は移ろぎだしました。レジーナ・ザウアーバック、あなたは単身、自由開拓者を裏切り、フォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝の反映を危うくしました。自分の正体が暴かれてしまったのは、あなただけの責任なのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “马卡里乌斯，你的坦率的确一眼可知。在我提到有人为贾帕克家族提供帮助时，你一脸不明所以，可你的妻子……你绝对想象不到她当时露出了怎样的神情。蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克，你背叛了行商浪人，危害了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，也暴露了你自己的行迹。”
languages.original_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: “马卡里乌斯，你的坦率的确一眼可知。在我提到有人为贾帕克家族提供帮助时，你一脸不明所以，可你的妻子，你绝不会相信她当时露出了怎样的神情。蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克，你背叛了行商浪人，危害了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，也暴露了你自己的行迹。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Macharius, votre franchise permet de lire en vous comme dans un livre ouvert. Quand j'ai indiqué que vous aviez aidé les Gaprak, tout dans votre attitude criait que vous n'aviez absolument aucune idée de ce dont je parlais. Votre épouse, en revanche... c'était à croire que les yeux allaient lui sortir de la tête. Régina Sauerback, vous seule avez trahi {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mettant ainsi en péril la dynastie commerciale von Valancius. Vous ne pouvez vous en prendre qu'à vous-même. »
languages.original_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: « Macharius, votre franchise permet de lire en vous comme dans un livre ouvert. Quand j'ai indiqué que vous aviez aidé les Gaprak, tout dans votre attitude criait que vous n'aviez absolument aucune idée de ce dont j'étais en train de parler. Votre épouse, en revanche... c'était à croire que les yeux allaient lui sortir de la tête. Régina Sauerback, vous seule avez trahi {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mettant ainsi en péril la dynastie commerciale von Valancius. En plus de vous être trahie vous-même. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Macharius, su franqueza le convierte en un libro abierto. Cuando hablé de la ayuda a los Gaprak, afirmó no tener ni idea de a qué me refería. Sin embargo, los ojos de su mujer decían lo contrario. Regina Sauerback, es usted quien traicionó {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente, poniendo en peligro la prosperidad de la dinastía comercial von Valancius. Y se ha revelado usted sola».
languages.original_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: «Macharius, su franqueza me abruma. Cuando hablé de la ayuda a los Gaprak, afirmó no tener ni idea. Sin embargo, los ojos de su mujer decían lo contrario. Regina Sauerback, es usted quien traicionó {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente, poniendo en peligro el bienestar de la dinastía comercial von Valancius y traicionándose también a ti misma».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Macharius, Eure Direktheit macht Euch zu einem offenen Buch. Als ich von der Hilfe für die Gapraks gesprochen habe, wusstet Ihr nicht, worum es geht. Eure Gemahlin dagegen, oh, deren Augen sind panisch hin- und hergehuscht. Regina Sauerback, Ihr allein habt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} verraten und den Wohlstand der Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius gefährdet. Und Ihr allein seid verantwortlich für Eure Enttarnung."
languages.original_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, Eure Direktheit macht Euch zu einem offenen Buch. Als ich von der Hilfe für die Gapraks gesprochen habe, wusstet Ihr nicht, worum es geht. Eure Gemahlin dagegen, oh, deren Augen sind panisch hin- und hergehuscht. Regina Sauerback, Ihr allein habt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} verraten und das Wohlergehen der Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius gefährdet. Und Ihr habt auch Euch selbst verraten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Dobrasın Macharius, gizlin saklın yok. Gaprak Hanesi mensuplarına yardım etmekten bahsettiğimde neyi kast ettiğimi anlamamıştın. Ancak eşin öyle değil... Gözleri öyle oynuyordu ki görsen inanmazdın. Regina Sauerback, Hür Tacir'e ihanet edip von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığının refahını tehlikeye atan bir tek sensin. Foyanın ortaya çıkmasında da tek sorumlu sensin."
languages.original_text: "Macharius, your bluntness makes you an open book. When I talked about helping the Gapraks, you had no idea what I was referring to. Your wife, on the other hand... her eyes started shifting like you would not believe. Regina Sauerback, you alone betrayed the Rogue Trader, jeopardising the prosperity of the von Valancius trade dynasty. And you alone are responsible for your unmasking."

traits.locale_text: "Dobrasın Macharius, gizlin saklın yok. Gaprak Hanesi mensuplarına yardım etmekten bahsettiğimde neyi kast ettiğimi anlamamıştın. Ancak eşin öyle değil... Gözleri öyle oynuyordu ki görsen inanmazdın. Regina Sauerback, Hür Tacir'e yalnızca sen ihanet ettin. Böylelikle von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığının refahını tehlikeye attın. Foyanın ortaya çıkmasında da tek sorumlu sensin."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
